main event: A civilian reported a sighting of 12 silver objects bobbing and weaving in the sky over Oakdale, California.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on May 5, 1947, at 1501 PST.,The observed objects were at an altitude of 2 miles.,The objects were estimated to be flying at very high speeds.,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 seconds.,The observer noted the maneuvers of the objects as bobbing and weaving.
